spec_data.Name: rubygem-vcr
spec_data.Description:
VCR provides a simple API to record and replay your test suite's HTTP
interactions.  It works with a variety of HTTP client libraries, HTTP stubbing
libraries and testing frameworks.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:31:43 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Record test suite HTTP interactions and replay during future test runs
